metadata.title: CVE-2024-38581 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu/mes: fix use-after-free issue Delete fence fallback timer to fixthe ramdom use-after-free issue. v2: move to amdgpu_mes.c

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
